statements: SELECT * FROM whiteboard_image;
SELECT image_id, created_by_user FROM whiteboard_image WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT created_by_user, COUNT(*) AS image_count FROM whiteboard_image GROUP BY created_by_user ORDER BY image_count DESC;
SELECT image_id, created_at FROM whiteboard_image WHERE created_by_user = 'Alice' AND annotations IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM whiteboard_image WHERE annotations @> '[{"type": "line"}]';
SELECT * FROM whiteboard_image WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT image_id, created_by_user FROM whiteboard_image WHERE LENGTH(created_by_user) > 5 ORDER BY image_id;
SELECT COUNT(image_id) AS total_images, created_by_user FROM whiteboard_image GROUP BY created_by_user HAVING COUNT(image_id) > 3;
SELECT image_id, jsonb_array_elements_text(annotations) AS annotation FROM whiteboard_image WHERE created_by_user = 'Alice';
SELECT image_id, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM created_at) AS month FROM whiteboard_image WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM created_at) = 2021 ORDER BY month DESC;
SELECT * FROM image_files WHERE user_id = '1234abcd';
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM image_files WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT id, created_at FROM annotations WHERE annotation_type = 'label';
SELECT * FROM image_files ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_size, created_at FROM image_files WHERE user_id = '5678efgh' AND file_size < 5000;
SELECT id, file_name, file_size FROM image_files WHERE file_type = 'jpg' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM image_files WHERE file_size > 1000 AND file_type = 'png';

SELECT file_name, COUNT(*) as total_annotations FROM image_files JOIN annotations ON image_files.id = annotations.image_id GROUP BY file_name HAVING total_annotations > 5 ORDER BY total_annotations DESC;
SELECT * FROM image_files WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';

SELECT annotations.annotation_text, image_files.file_name FROM annotations JOIN image_files ON annotations.image_id = image_files.id WHERE annotations.annotation_color = 'red' AND annotations.annotation_type = 'highlight';
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_id, upload_timestamp FROM images WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT annotation_text, creation_timestamp FROM annotations WHERE created_by_user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT image_id, annotation_text FROM annotations ORDER BY creation_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM images LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_id, upload_timestamp FROM images WHERE uploaded_by_user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM annotations JOIN images ON annotations.image_id = images.image_id WHERE created_by_user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY creation_timestamp DESC;
SELECT images.image_id, images.upload_timestamp, users.username FROM images JOIN users ON images.uploaded_by_user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT image_id, count(annotation_id) FROM annotations GROUP BY image_id HAVING count(annotation_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM image_files;
SELECT file_name, file_data FROM image_files;
SELECT annotation_id, annotation_text FROM annotations ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT file_id, user_id FROM whiteboard WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM image_files ORDER BY file_name DESC;
SELECT annotation_text, created_at FROM annotations WHERE user_id = '12345';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '67890';
SELECT * FROM whiteboard WHERE created_at >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT file_name, LENGTH(file_data) AS data_length FROM image_files WHERE file_id = 'abc123';
SELECT * FROM Images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_name, image_data FROM Images ORDER BY image_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT annotation_text FROM Annotations WHERE image_id = 2 AND user_id = 1;
SELECT whiteboard_id, whiteboard_name FROM Whiteboards ORDER BY whiteboard_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT Images.image_name, Annotations.annotation_text FROM Images JOIN Annotations ON Images.image_id = Annotations.image_id;
SELECT Users.username, Whiteboards.whiteboard_name FROM Users JOIN Annotations ON Users.user_id = Annotations.user_id JOIN Whiteboards ON Annotations.image_id = Whiteboards.whiteboard_id;
SELECT image_id, image_name, LENGTH(image_data) AS image_size FROM Images WHERE LENGTH(image_data) > 10000;
